feed.title: Sergio's Secret Blog - productivity
feed.subtitle: An assortment of my ramblings and random adventures.

entry.title: [11] Setting Up a Supercharged Neovim Configuration
entry.summary: Over the summer, after finally getting around to learning Vim motions (see blog post #9), I quickly fell down the Neovim rabbithole and have been procrastinating work by tinkering away at my configurations ever since! This post will be sharing setup that I have currently landed at to turn my Neovim editor into a supercharged workhorse.

entry.title: [2] Biggest Takeaways from The Missing Semester of Your CS Education
entry.summary: Nearly a year ago, I took an online course called The Missing Semester of Your CS Education. The course was created by a group of MIT students and covers a wide range of topics that are often overlooked in traditional computer science curriculums. The course is designed to help students become more productive and efficient programmers by teaching them essential skills that are not typically taught in school.
